content: I'm looking for some tips on editing software. I've been using Lightroom and Photoshop, but I'm not sure if I'm using them to their full potential. By the way, I've been really into photography lately, especially since I got my new camera last month. In early May, I started a photography project where I aim to take a photo every day for a month, so I'm trying to improve my editing skills to make the most of it.
